chart_description: This chart displays the size of the HTTP cache for Nginx Plus over time. The HTTP cache stores frequently accessed content to minimize the number of times a client needs to fetch the same content, improving performance and user experience. This chart shows how the cache size changes and allows you to monitor storage capacity and ensure that the cache is performing optimally.

dimension_descriptions.size: The size of the HTTP cache in bytes. This dimension provides insight into the current cache capacity and usage, giving you an indication of how much content is being cached and how much space is available for new content.
